name: London
description: London is the capital and largest city of England and the United Kingdom

name: Berlin
description: Berlin is the capital and largest city of Germany by both area and population.

name: Madrid
description: Madrid is the capital and most populous city of Spain.

name: Kyiv
description: Kyiv or Kiev is the capital and most populous city of Ukraine.

name: Rome
description: Rome is the capital city of Italy.

name: Warsaw
description: Warsaw officially the Capital City of Warsaw, is the capital and largest city of Poland.

name: Budapest
description: It is the ninth-largest city in the European Union by population within city limits and the second-largest city on Danube river;

name: Tbilisi
description: Tbilisi was founded in the 5th century AD by Vakhtang I of Iberia, and since then has served as the capital of various Georgian kingdoms and republics

name: Stockholm
description: Stockholm is the capital and largest city of Sweden as well as the largest urban area in Scandinavia.

name: Naples
description: Naples is a city in Collier County, Florida, United States.

name: Riga
description: Riga is the capital and largest city of Latvia and is home to 671,000 inhabitants which is a third of Latvia's population.

name: Zaragoza
description: Zaragoza, also known in English as Saragossa, is the capital city of the Zaragoza Province and of the autonomous community of Aragon, Spain
